snippet.title: Embers of Spiritflame - Free Indie Game Release Teaser
snippet.description:
WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3211980/Embers_Of_Spiritflame/
Out on October 14th on Steam

Embers of Spiritflame is an Emotional Point & Click detective adventure about the exploration of an old abandoned house. Inside, You go through comic book-inspired levels and begin to uncover why is everyone missing. View events and memories of the place and piece together the story.

hiiiiii! its finally here! you can play the game very soon and I'm proud of it. We've been testing the demo past month and the feedback's been great :PPPPP

===================================

Subscribe: https://bit.ly/3OI5r2S

Linktree: https://linktr.ee/simonhytte

===================================

#gamedev  #simonhytte #godot  #unitygameengine #indiegames #videogames #gaming #trailer #trailers #gametrailers #horrorgaming #arcade #arcadegames #cartoon 

Thank you for all the support and watching!
